data.title: Distant Space 2 (Steam) Giveaway
data.description: Dive into retro-inspired indie space action! Grab Distant Space 2 for free on Steam!
data.instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download this game directly via Steam store before the offer expires.
3. That´s it! Keep the Steam game in your Steam library forever!

data.title: Wizard of Legend (Epic Games) Giveaway
data.description: Put your wizarding skills to the test, don´t miss this incredible giveaway! Grab Wizard of Legend for free via Epic Games Store! Wizard of Legend is a fun fast paced dungeon crawler with rogue-like elements, dynamic magical combat and procedurally generated levels!
data.instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

data.title: Santa Rockstar (PC) Giveaway
data.description: Celebrate Christmas with the power of Rock! Grab Santa Rockstar for free via IndieGala and Slay guitar solos as a heavy metal loving Santa.
data.instructions:
1. Login into your free IndieGala account.
2. Scroll down and click the "Add to Your Library" button to add the game to your library.
3. Go to "My Library" to find your game.

data.title: Black Desert (Steam) Giveaway
data.description: Grab Black Desert Online for free on Steam! Black Desert Online is a popular open-world action MMORPG with impressive graphics.
data.instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download directly via Steam before the offer expires.
3. That's it! Enjoy your new Steam game!

data.title: World of Warships: Happy Holiday Giveaway
data.description:
The holiday season has arrived, claim lots of free goodies for World of Warships! Please note this giveaway is for new players only. You just need to create your free account to unlock the following in-game items:

- 14 Days of Premium account
- Tier IV Ship - SHIPMENT_WW4 
- 500 Dubloons 
- 2,025,000 credits 
- 10x Camouflages Winter Strands 
- 10x Camouflages Frosty fir tree
data.instructions:
1. Click the button to activate the reward and visit the giveaway page.
2. Click the box and then the "Play free on PC" button.
3. Enter the required information in the registration field.
3. The reward should be added automatically if you followed our link.

data.title: THRONE AND LIBERTY 300 Ornate Coins Key Giveaway
data.description: Claim your free THRONE AND LIBERTY 300 Ornate Coins Key and use these coins to purchase in-game items like Amitoi, Morphs, Titles, and more. You can also acquire items to enhance your gear and advance your skills!
data.instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your free Alienware Arena account and click the button to unlock your key.
3. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

data.title: Winexy (PC) Giveaway
data.description: Have you ever wanted to be a giant ball? No? Well, now's your chance to give it a try! Winexy is a free puzzle game available on Indiegala, where you take control of a realistic 3D ball and put your skills to the test.
data.instructions:
1. Login into your free IndieGala account.
2. Scroll down and click the "Add to Your Library" button to add the game to your library.
3. Go to "My Library" to find your game.

data.title: Asphalt 8: Car Bundle 435 Giveaway
data.description: Score Asphalt 8: Car Bundle 435 for free via Epic Games Store and unlock the Bugatti Divo and Dash Diva Avatar! This giveaway will end on January 9th so grab it now before it´s too late!

2. Install Asphalt 8 (free-to-play) via Epic Games Store
3. Add and Install this DLC before the offer expires.

data.title: Black Desert Online - Traveler Edition Giveaway
data.description: Score Black Desert Online - Traveler Edition for free! Black Desert Online is an open-world MMORPG with fast-paced combat and realistic environments. Check it out!
data.instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page
2. Click the "Get Black Desert Now" button under "Traveler Edition"
3. Login or create your account to unlock the game.

data.title: Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms - Grymforge Karlach Party Pack Giveaway
data.description: Claim your free Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms - Grymforge Karlach Party Pack (DLC) via Epic Games Store. Each pack unlocks 3 of the Baldur's Gate 3 Champions in Idle Champions: Karlach, Gale, and Halsin. Plus 14 Platinum Champion Chests for each, and an exclusive Skin for Karlach!
data.instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Install Idle Champions of the Forgotten Realms via Epic Games Store
3. Add and Install this DLC before the offer expires.

data.title: World of Tanks: Holidays 2025 Giveaway
data.description:
Celebrate the Holidays with World of Tanks and Jason Statham! New players can unlock exclusive rewards and epic bonuses - don’t miss out! This giveaway ends on January 13, 2025!

Bonuses for new players: 

- T2 Light Tank
- 7 Days of Premium Account
- 1 Garage slot
- 100% trained crew
- 200,000 credits
data.instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to activate the reward.
2. Click "I´m a New Player" and enter the required information in the registration field.
3. The reward should be added automatically if you followed our link.

data.title: 3on3 FreeStyle - 4th Anniversary DLC (Steam) Giveaway
data.description: Celebrate the 4rd Anniversary of 3on3 FreeStyle with a nice Crossplay 4th Anniversary Gift Pack DLC via Steam. This anniversary gift pack includes 40,000 Coins, 40 Points and much more! Please note the base game 3on3 FreeStyle: Rebound (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this DLC content.
data.instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download this DLC directly via Steam before the offer expires.
3. Don´t forget to install the base game on Steam.

data.title: Croaking Around (Itch.io) Giveaway
data.description: Looking for some amphibious fun? Download Croaking Around for free on Itch.io. This charming 2D acrobatic platformer lets you take on the role of a little frog with an incredibly stretchy tongue. Check it out!
data.instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Click the button "Download or Claim" before the offer expires.
3. Login into your itch.io account to access the game.

data.title: Mafia King Gift Pack Key Giveaway
data.description:
GamesHub and GamerPower have partnered up to get our users an exclusive free gift pack key with in-game items for Mafia King. Each pack unlocks Gold, VIP Points and more.

Each Pack Unlocks:
- Construction Speedup (60m) *30
- Lv 2 Resource Chest *600
- 100 VIP Points *60
- Training Speedup (60m) *30
- Training Speedup (5m) *60
- Construction Speedup (5m) *160,
- 100 Gold *60

Mafia King is a real-time global game in 3D for online strategy battle fans.
data.instructions: 1. Log in to your free GamerPower account and click the button to unlock your key. 2. Click here (Android) or Click here (iOS Devices) and sign up to play the game or log in with your existing account. 3. Click your avatar. 4. Click "Settings" and "Gift Pack Exchange".
